|rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2112; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== CPU is part # FWIXP422BB "2003.09.01" and "70-510302-05" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The manual specifies the default SSID as '''NETGEAR'''. ==Links of Interest== * [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=259526 netgear WG302] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|activation}} [[dd-wrt-wiki:Supported_Devices#Netgear|Support Chart]]
dd-wrt as of = WG302v1 v24 SP2 - build 11351 ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wg302_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wg302 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 8.09 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
